name: sensor-simulator
description: Simulation of various sensor protocols to show improvements of some over others.

scripts.run: node node_modules/tslint/bin/tslint --project tsconfig.json; node node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build; node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc; node build/main.js

author: Eric Ferreira, Pelin Icer, Korn Sooksatra, Hema Nair
